about.title: About Me
about.description: I tried C++, java, and Android development, but when I tried JS that's when I knew what I want to do. Modern web development with TypeScript and Node is a way to go. I have experience working in production company, outsource development company and now I'm working as a freelancer. Feel free to contact me if you want to work together or have any questions.
